column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This has become my favorite restaurant in Chicago
column2: and my 5-star rating isn't a case of severe fanboyism
column3: but is a distinction well-earned through repeated visits. I've been to Spain and loved the food there
column4: so I was very excited to try. The first time I went was with a couple friends
column5: and I was very impressed with the quality of food
column7: and service. It's not the most authentic Spanish cuisine
column8: but the inspiration and heart is there.
